sfrfile.header:
Version: @(#)regtc11ib-ext.xml 1.2 09/03/11 Generated from @(#)regtc11ib-ext.xml 1.2 09/03/11
This file contains all SFR and BIT names and on-chip register definitions It is based on the following document(s): - TC11IB_umsu_v11_1.pdf (April 2002)
Copyright 2002-2010 Altium BV

sfr.name: core_base
sfr.description: The base address off the memory for the CSFR's

sfr.name: BTV
sfr.description: Base Address of Trap Vector Table Pointer.

sfr.name: BIV
sfr.description: Base Address of Interrupt Vector Table

sfr.name: CPM1
sfr.description: Code Protection Mode Register, Set 1 (2 bytes)

sfr.name: CPM0
sfr.description: Code Protection Mode Register, Set 0 (2 bytes)

sfr.name: DPM1
sfr.description: Data Protection Mode Register, Set 1 (4 bytes)

sfr.name: DPM0
sfr.description: Data Protection Mode Register, Set 0 (4 bytes)

sfr.name: CPR1_1U
sfr.description: Code Seg. Prot. Reg. 1, Set 1, upper

sfr.description: Code Seg. Prot. Reg. 1, Set 1, lower

sfr.name: MMU_TPX
sfr.description: MMU MMU Translation Page Index Register

sfr.name: LCU_EDAT
sfr.description: LCU Error Data Capture Register (64-bit register)

bitfield.name: LCEATF
bitfield.description: DCU register load asynchronous error flag

bitfield.name: SCEATF
bitfield.description: DCU register store asynchronous error flag

bitfield.name: CRLEATF
bitfield.description: Cache refill load asynchronous error flag

bitfield.name: CRSEATF
bitfield.description: Cache refill store asynchronous error flag

bitfield.name: CWLEATF
bitfield.description: Cache writeback load asynchronous error flag

bitfield.name: CWSEATF
bitfield.description: Cache writeback store asynchronous error flag

bitfield.name: LCESTF
bitfield.description: DCU register load synchronous error flag

bitfield.name: SCESTF
bitfield.description: DCU register store synchronous error flag

bitfield.name: CRLESTF
bitfield.description: Cache refill load synchronous error flag

bitfield.name: CRSESTF
bitfield.description: Cache refill store synchronous error flag

bitfield.name: CWLESTF
bitfield.description: Cache writeback load synchronous error flag

bitfield.name: CWSESTF
bitfield.description: Cache writeback store synchronous error flag

sfr.name: CPU_SRCSB
sfr.description: Software Break Service Request Control Register

group.name: Ethernet Controller: Data Management Unit Transmit

sfr.name: DTFTDA
sfr.description: DT First Tx Descriptor Address Register

group.name: Ethernet Controller: Data Management Unit Receive

sfr.name: DRFRDA
sfr.description: DR First Rx Descriptor Address Register

bitfield.name: FPIDAT
bitfield.description: Captured FPI-Bus Data (in case of a bus error).

bitfield.name: FPIADR
bitfield.description: Captured FPI-Bus Address (in case of a bus error).

bitfield.name: TOUT
bitfield.description: State of FPI-Bus Time-Out Signal (active high).

bitfield.name: RDY
bitfield.description: State of FPI-Bus Ready Signal (active high).

bitfield.name: ABT
bitfield.description: State of FPI-Bus Abort Signal (active low).

bitfield.name: SVM
bitfield.description: State of FPI-Bus Supervisor Mode Signal (active high).

bitfield.name: WRN
bitfield.description: State of FPI-Bus Write Signal (active low).

bitfield.name: RDN
bitfield.description: State of FPI-Bus Read Signal (active low).

bitfield.name: REGEN
bitfield.description: Switch the clock of the ComDRAM register

bitfield.name: EN
bitfield.description: Switch the clock of the ComDRAM

bitfield.name: CNT1
bitfield.description: Counter for BCOPY, COPY and EXIT

bitfield.name: PCDE
bitfield.description: Prevent Channel Disable on Illegal Exit Instruction

bitfield.name: ITP
bitfield.description: PCP Interrupt Threshold Service Request Priority Number

bitfield.name: SRR
bitfield.description: Service Request Node Service Request Bit

bitfield.name: CLRR
bitfield.description: Service Request Node Request Clear Bit

bitfield.name: SETR
bitfield.description: Service Request Node Request Set Bit

bitfield.name: SDS
bitfield.description: Status of the delayed suspend output.

sfr.description: Multi-Core Debug Break bus switch status and control

bitfield.name: RW_ENABLED
bitfield.description: Used by user program for security.

bitfield.name: CRSYNC
bitfield.description: Read sync bit for Communication Mode.

bitfield.name: CWSYNC
bitfield.description: Write sync bit for Communication Mode.

bitfield.name: CW_ACK
bitfield.description: Write request acknowledge in Communication Mode.

bitfield.name: COM_SYNC
bitfield.description: High level sync bit for Communication Mode.

bitfield.name: CHANNEL
bitfield.description: Selects the addressed CPU (monitor)in Communication Mode.

bitfield.name: REQSLP
bitfield.description: Idle Mode and Sleep Mode Request Bits.

sfr.name: PMG_CSR
sfr.description: Power Management Control and Status Register

bitfield.name: DSREQ
bitfield.description: HRST Reset Enable during Deep Sleep Mode.

bitfield.name: WDTTIM
bitfield.description: The current value of the WDT counter.

bitfield.name: WDTIR
bitfield.description: Watchdog Timer Input Frequency Request Control Bit.

bitfield.name: WDTDR
bitfield.description: Watchdog Timer Disable Request Control Bit.

bitfield.name: WDTLCK
bitfield.description: Lock bit to Control Access to WDT_CON0.

bitfield.name: WDTPW
bitfield.description: User-Definable Password Field for Access to WDT_CON0.

bitfield.name: WDTREL
bitfield.description: Reload Value for the Watchdog Timer.

bitfield.name: RSEXT
bitfield.description: HRST Line State during last Reset.

bitfield.name: RRSTM
bitfield.description: Reset Request for the System Timer

bitfield.name: SW_CFG
bitfield.description: Software Boot Value for the Boot Configuration Signals.

bitfield.name: SW_OCDS_E
bitfield.description: Software Boot Value for the OCDS Enable Signal.

bitfield.name: SW_BRK_IN
bitfield.description: Software Boot Value for the Break Signal.
